name: Asmaa Adnane
content: Asma Adnane | Computer Science | Loughborough University Dr Asma Adnane Senior Lecturer Programme Leader: BSc Information Technology Management for Business; BSc Computing and Management Research groups and centres Cyber, Networks and Systems Publications +44 (0)1509 223 068 Send email Office: N.3.04 (Haslegrave Building) Biography Research External activities Memberships Asma is a Senior Lecturer in the Computer Science department of Loughborough University. After getting her PhD in 2008 at the university of Rennes in France, Asma did a postdoc at polytechNantes, and was working as a research assistant for different universities in France (polytech Nantes, university of Rennes, ENSI Bourges and ESAIP-Angers). Before joining Loughborough, Asma was a senior lecturer in the University of Derby (2013-2018) and a KTP associate at the university of Leicester and Crowdlab â€“ Leicester (2011-2013). Her main research focus is on Networks and Security. Research areas Cyber security Trust management Ad hoc networks routing and security Vehicular networks IoT security Data governance Organising and co-chair of the international workshop of Trust in cloud computing. Fellow of the HEA Member of Women in Security Member of Women in Engineering Society Member of the British Computer Society IEEE VTS society (Vehicular Technology Society)
